articles.title: Detailed Report about Kim Jong Il's Transit and Visit to Northeast China
articles.content:
Detailed Report about Kim Jong Il's Transit and Visit to Northeast China

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, paid a historic visit to Northeast China while passing through it from August 25 to 27 on his way home after winding up his tours of the Siberian and Far East regions of Russia.
					
					He was accompanied by Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Pak Pong Ju, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, O Su Yong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and Ri Ki Bom, DPRK consul general in Shenyang.
					
					Kim Jong Il passing through Northeast China was kindly greeted by Dai Bingguo, state councilor of China, in Heilongjiang Province on August 26 upon the special authorization of General Secretary Hu Jintao and the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
					
					He was also greeted by Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Sheng Guangzu, minister of Railways, and other senior central officials of China and senior party and government officials of the province.
					
					He exchanged warm greetings with Dai Bingguo and had a talk with him.
					
					Dai Bingguo said that Northeast China receiving Kim Jong Il again after the lapse of three months is now wrapped in a festive atmosphere. He offered warm welcome to Kim Jong Il on behalf of General Secretary Hu Jintao, the collective leadership of the CPC and all the Chinese people.
					
					Dai Bingguo said the appreciation made by Kim Jong Il of the socialist modernization drive in China while traveling Inner Mongolia and Heilongjiang Province constitutes great encouragement and support to the Chinese people advancing under the leadership of the CPC, adding that the party, government and people of China would join the Korean comrades in striving hard to boost the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship.
					
					Dai Bingguo hosted a banquet in honor of Kim Jong Il transiting and visiting Northeast China.
					
					Kim Jong Il visited various enterprises and urban construction objects of Qiqihar City and Daqing City in Heilongjiang Province that day, conducted by Dai Bingguo, Wang Jiarui, Sheng Guangzu and other senior central officials of China.
					
					That day Dai Bingguo extended again the best wishes to Kim Jong Il passing through Northeast China in the wake of his visit to Russia on behalf of Hu Jintao and the collective leadership and warmly sent him off.
					
					Kim Jong Il was accorded sincere and warm welcome by senior central and regional officials and people of China wherever he went while passing through Northeast China for three days and more deeply got familiar with the customs and living of the people in Northeast China while having friendly conversations with them.
					
					He was accompanied by Wang Jiarui and Sheng Guangzu upon the authorization of Hu Jintao and the collective leadership in the whole period of his transit and visit to Northeast China.
					
					He was also accompanied by senior party and government officials of relevant provinces and cities.
					
					He passed through the Inner Mongolian Autonomous Region of China on August 25.
					
					He arrived in Manzhouli of the region, the border railway station, that afternoon.
					
					When the train pulled in the railway station, he was warmly greeted by Wang Jiarui, Sheng Guangzu, Hu Chunhua, secretary of the Inner Mongolian Autonomous Regional Party Committee, Fu Taizeng, secretary general of the autonomous regional party committee, Luo Zhihu, secretary of the Hulun Buir City Party Committee, the mayor of Hulun Buir City, the secretary of the Manzhouli City Party Committee and other central and regional senior officials of China. 
					
					He exchanged cordial greetings with the senior officials present to greet him and had a talk with them.
					
					Wang Jiarui said he was specially dispatched to conduct Kim Jong Il who is passing through Northeast China in the whole period of his visit upon the authorization of the collective leadership of China including Hu Jintao. He paid highest tribute to Kim Jong Il for having made a great contribution to boosting the friendship among countries and accomplishing the human cause of independence through his energetic external activities.
					
					Kim Jong Il thanked Wang Jiarui and other senior central and local officials and people for their warm reception.
					
					He, conducted by senior party and government officials of the autonomous region, toured Hailar District, Hulun Buir City of the region. 
					
					Commanding a bird's-eye view of the night scenery, he got familiar with the history and culture of the region and the achievements made by its people in construction.
					
					The Inner Mongolian Autonomous Regional Committee of the CPC gave a grand banquet in honor of Kim Jong Il visiting the region.
					
					When he appeared in the banquet hall, women of the Mongolian tribe of the autonomous region presented him with a blue silk towel and liquor according to the customs peculiar to the nation, warmly welcoming him.
					
					Hu Chunhua said that today they welcomed Kim Jong Il to the vast steppe where President Kim Il Sung was accorded enthusiastic welcome several times long ago, thereby seeing the desire of the party, the government and the people of the autonomous region come true at last.
					
					Hu Chunhua noted that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship will remain ever-green like the vast steppe along with history, expressing firm belief that the friendly Korean people would make fresh success in the efforts to improve the standard of people's living and build a prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					A specially prepared art performance was given in honor of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The performers clearly reflected the boundless respect and reverence of the government and the people of the region for Kim Jong Il visiting China again for the development of the Sino-DPRK friendship.
					
					Kim Jong Il conveyed a floral basket to the performers in congratulation of their successful performance and had a photo taken with them.
					
					He was presented with a gift by Hu Chunhua on behalf of the party committee of the autonomous region.
					
					He expressed thanks for the warm reception and cordial hospitality accorded him by the party, government and people of the Inner Mongolian Autonomous Region. He hoped the people of the region would achieve a fresh victory in their struggle for the prosperity and development of the country under the leadership of the CPC.
					
					Kim Jong Il passed through Heilongjiang Province of China on August 26.
					
					He arrived in Qiqihar City, Heilongjiang Province that morning.
					
					When the train pulled in Qiqihar Railway Station, he was warmly greeted by Ji Bingxuan, secretary of the Heilongjiang Provincial Party Committee, Wang Xiankui, governor of Heilongjiang Province, the secretary of the Qiqihar City Party Committee, the mayor of Qiqihar City and other senior party and government officials of the province and the city.
					
					He exchanged warm greetings with the senior officials present to greet him and had a talk with them.
					
					Ji Bingxuan said it is great honor and pride to welcome again to their place Kim Jong Il on a long foreign tour for friendship among countries and warmly welcomed him on behalf of the party, the government and the people of Heilongjiang Province.
					
					Kim Jong Il visited the Qiqihar Machine Tool Group Co. No. 2 that day.
					
					After being briefed on its history by a senior official of the group, he went round several production processes to acquaint himself with its production, technological development and management in detail.   
					
					Then he visited the Qiqihar Branch Company of the Mengniu Dairy.
					
					He went round the general control room, milk tank, packing shop and the products on display and wished the company greater progress in its work for the improvement of the standard of  people's diet and welfare.
					
					Kim Jong Il also visited Daqing City that day.
					
					He visited the urban planning exhibition hall in Daqing City and was briefed on the urban construction and long-term plan. Then he went round the housing construction district, a large bridge, Lake Liming Bridge now under construction and other places in the province.
					
					The provincial party committee gave a banquet that evening in honor of Kim Jong Il visiting the province. 
					
					He was present at the banquet on invitation.
					
					Ji Bingxuan said that the historic visit paid by Kim Jong Il to Heilongjiang Province again after the lapse of the three months is a striking demonstration of the Sino-DPRK friendship growing stronger day by day, adding that the provincial party, government and people would join the Korean people in playing a greater role in inheriting and developing the Sino-DPRK friendship generation after generation.
					
					A special art performance was given in welcome of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The performers successfully represented the excitement and joy of the Chinese people at welcoming again Kim Jong Il to meaningful Northeast China.
					
					Kim Jong Il conveyed a floral basket to the artistes in congratulation of their successful performance.
					
					He was presented with a gift by the provincial party and people's government that day in welcome of him visiting the province.
					
					He expressed thanks for the warm reception and cordial hospitality accorded to him by the party, government and people of Heilongjiang Province. He hoped the people of the province would achieve a fresh victory in their struggle for the prosperity and development of the country under the leadership of the CPC.
					
					Kim Jong Il passed through Jilin Province, China on Aug. 27.
					
					He arrived in Tonghua City, Jilin Province that morning.
					
					When the train pulled in Tonghua Railway Station, he was warmly greeted by Sun Zhengcai, secretary of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee, Wang Rulin, governor of Jilin Province, Liu Baowei, secretary of the Tonghua City Party Committee, Tian Yulin, mayor of Tonghua City, and other senior party and government officials of the province and the city.
					
					He exchanged warm greetings with the officials present there to receive him and visited the Tonghua Wine Co. Ltd., conducted by them.
					
					He recollected with deep emotion the noble footprints left by President Kim Il Sung who was absorbed in thinking and made inquiry for the sake of the country and its people only when visiting the company nearly half a century ago.
					
					He went round various places including the wine depot, its exhibition hall to learn in detail about the history of the company and its production system, storage of products and its taste. He wished the company greater progress in its work for the well-being of the people.
					
					The party and government of the province hosted a grand banquet in honor of Kim Jong Il visiting the province.
					
					He was present there on invitation.
					
					Sun Zhengcai said that it was particular privilege and honor for his province to receive Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, three times in a little more than one year. He offered the highest regard and warm welcome to Kim Jong Il on behalf of the party, government and people of the province.
					
					Noting that all the Chinese people including the people of the province are rejoiced as over their own over the successes made by the Korean people recently in their efforts to significantly commemorate the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, Sun Zhengcai expressed expectation and belief that the Korean people would surely win a shining victory in the drive for building a prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					Sun noted that the party, government and people of the province would join the Korean people in playing a bigger role in inheriting and developing the Sino-DPRK friendship generation after generation. 
					
					An art performance was given in welcome of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The performance replete with the warm feelings of the DPRK-China friendship was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					He was presented with a gift by the provincial party and people's government that day in welcome of his visit to the province.
					
					He expressed thanks for the warm reception and cordial hospitality accorded to him by the party, government and people of Jilin Province. He wished them a fresh success in their efforts for the prosperity of the country and the well-being of its people under the leadership of the CPC.
					
					He wrapped up his 8 000 km odd-long trip to the Far East and the Siberian regions of Russia and Northeast China and left for the homeland that day.
					
					Before his departure, he exchanged warm farewell greetings with central leading officials including Wang Jiarui and Sheng Guangzu who conducted him with sincerity in the whole period of his visit and leading officials of the party and government of the province and the city including Sun Zhengcai and Wang Rulin.
					
					When the train started from the border station, central and local leading officials of China warmly sent him off, waving their hands for a long while.
					
					Passing through several cities and regions of China, he acquainted himself with construction projects, ideas and feelings, politics, economy, history, culture, etc. of the Chinese people more deeply and conducted unremitting and energetic external activities, making another great contribution to the development of the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					His transit and visit to Northeast China successfully took place thanks to the particular concern of Hu Jintao and the party, the government and the people of China.
					
					He expressed his satisfaction over this and expressed sincere thanks to the Central Committee of the CPC, the State Council and leading officials and the people of the Inner Mongolian Autonomous Region, Heilongjiang and Jilin provinces for the kind and cordial hospitality accorded to him.

articles.title: Songun Leadership Is Vital for Victory
articles.content:
Songun Leadership Is Vital for Victory

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Guinean and British organizations and an international organization posted articles on internet on Aug. 22 and 23 on the 51st anniversary of start of Songun revolutionary leadership by Kim Jong Il.
					
					The Guinean Media Association carried his photos and a special write-up titled "Kim Jong Il, 51 years of Songun leadership".
					
					The article noted that the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il is the fundamental factor that made it possible for the DPRK, a small country, to defend its sovereignty and dignity and emerge victorious in the acute stand-off with the U.S. which styles itself the world's "only superpower."
					
					As long as there is the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, Korea will certainly carry out the cause of building a thriving nation in the near future, the article noted.
					
					The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea jointly edited an article titled "Songun and Unity".
					
					It said that the DPRK has brought about great successes thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The DPRK has frustrated all moves of the imperialists and honorably defended the sovereignty of the country, the article said, stressing that if the U.S. imperialists attack the DPRK, its army and people will rally as one and wipe out the U.S. imperialists under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain carried an article titled "Songun and Kim Jong Il", praising his exploits of the Songun leadership.

articles.title: Joint Academic Seminar Held
articles.content:
Joint Academic Seminar Held

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A joint academic seminar for checking Japan's invasion of Tok Islets and urging Japan to redress its past was opened in Pyongyang and Seoul on Monday on the lapse of 101 years since the Japanese imperialists' fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty."
					
					It was expected to hold the seminar in Kaesong with the north, the south and overseas sides present, but the south side authorities disallowed the participation of the south side delegation in the seminar, compelling them to hold it separately.
					
					The north-side academic seminar took place at the Central Hall of Workers.
					
					Present there were members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and various sub-committees, the North Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-National Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and officials in the fields of social science, education and media.
					
					Prior to the seminar, a letter of solidarity sent by the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration was read out.
					
					The issue of defending the territory and sovereignty of Korea is a nation-wide task, the letter said, calling on the political parties, organizations and personages in the north, the south and abroad to firmly solidarize with each other in the struggle to check Japan's reinvasion and urge Japan to redress its past.
					
					The floor was taken by Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the Academic Sub-Committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, Kim Chun Sil, member of the Committee on Measures for Compensation to Former Korean "Comfort Women" for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims, and Ho Jong Ho, member of the Academic Sub-Committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					Proving that Tok Islets are part of the inviolable territory of Korea, they bitterly denounced Japan for its moves for reinvasion and called upon all Koreans to carry on their vigorous actions for checking and foiling its scenario for grabbing Tok Islets.
					
					The sexual slavery for the Japanese imperialists is unpardonable, they noted, calling on the Korean women to force Japan to pay for the disgrace suffered by them.
					
					Drawing attention to the persistent moves to distort the history in Japan, they called upon all Koreans to turn out in the struggle to force it to settle its past wrongdoings.
					
					Then, papers on the above-said theme and texts of speeches from the south and overseas sides were introduced at the seminar.
					
					A joint appeal of the North, South and Overseas Sides Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: DPRK-made Goods Gain Popularity at Trade Fair
articles.content:
DPRK-made Goods Gain Popularity at Trade Fair

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK-made goods enjoyed popularity at the 1st Rason International Trade Fair held in the DPRK recently.
					
					Local industrial establishments and companies exhibited more than 30 000 items in 180 kinds at the fair. 
					
					The Ryonha Machinery Company displayed cutting tools and measuring instruments while the Rason Hyesong Trading Company put garments on show. The Rason Orient Industry Company sent sulphur mud and medicine for skin nutrition to the fair. 
					
					Varieties of storage batteries made by the Taedonggang Battery Factory, organic compound fertilizer by the Rason Paeksok J. V. Company and inorganic foaming agents by the Rason Taehung Trading Company drew many visitors. 
					
					Many foreigners were interested in asteroid pills sent by the Jinung Trading Company, pillows made of natural active materials and moxibustion stones by the Rason Ogasan Technological Trading Company and steamed and dried Kaesong Koryo Insam (ginseng) by the Korea Jangsu Trading Corporation. 
					
					The August 28 General Trading Corporation exhibited overcoats, caps and mufflers made with rabbit fur and the Rajin Drink Factory put  several dozen kinds of foodstuffs and soft drink on show.  
					
					During the trade fair, some of the local enterprises and companies discussed dealings and concluded contracts with foreign businesses.

articles.title: Household Solar Water Heater Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Household Solar Water Heater Developed in DPRK

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Heat Engineering Institute of the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has developed a solar water heater for home use.
					
					The solar water heater is based on gravitational pipe. It, quicker than the plate water heater in heat exchange, keeps water pipe from being frozen even in sub-zero temperature.
					
					It is easy to manufacture as its structure is simple.
					
					Once set up, it can always provide hot water, not subject to seasonal restriction.
					
					A heating plate of one square meter is enough to keep 70-80 liters of water and that of 1.5 square meter 100 liters of water as warm as 40-45 degrees centigrade.
					
					Researcher O Kyu Hak told KCNA a house which had used coal to heat water can save 500 kilograms of coal a year by use of a 1.5 square meter water heater.
					
					The solar water heater has already proved effective in Taedong County, South Phyongan Province, and other areas of the country.
					
					It won a prize at the 25th National Festival of Science and Technology.

articles.title: Production of Rolled Steel Plates by High Temperature Air Combustion Technology Starts
articles.content:
Production of Rolled Steel Plates by High Temperature Air Combustion Technology Starts

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the nation's giant iron producer in the northern part of the country, began producing rolled steel plates from a modern high temperature air combustion heating furnace put on a CNC basis.
					
					The establishment of the system for producing steel billets by use of locally available fuel means a great technological progress made in placing the nation's metal industry on a Juche-oriented and modern basis.
					
					A high-pitched drive was waged at the complex to rebuild heating furnace No. 3 of its hot-rolling shop into a high temperature air combustion heating furnace. The complex completed in a brief span of time the Korean-style design for the above-said heating furnace having a simple and reasonable structure suited to its actual conditions.
					
					The invention and introduction of a new method helped the complex successfully manufacture in a short span of time dozens of boxes for accumulating heat requiring high technology.
					
					Various pipe networks for furnace were successfully laid and a timely production and supply of parts of machines and tens of thousands of accessories necessary for assembling the furnace were ensured. 
					
					Dozens of iron pillars made their appearances in the place where the heating furnace No. 3 was dismantled. The complex solved technologically difficult issues rising in building the heating furnace including the construction of a furnace roof whose fireproof materials weigh hundreds of tons.
					
					Teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology in cooperation with technicians and workers of the complex developed by their own efforts dozens of programs for controlling and operating processes and built a control panel for regulating temperature, pressure and amount of flowing molten iron inside the heating furnace, etc. 
					
					The successful building of the above-said heating furnace at the complex made it possible to keep the production going at a high rate while cutting down manpower and the consumption of materials by use of only gas without using any heavy oil.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Closes Hanchongryon Homepage
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Closes Hanchongryon Homepage

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean police on August 26 forcibly closed the homepage of the Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon), the south Korean Yonhap News reported.
					
					The police collaborated with the Broadcasting and News Service Committee, charging that the homepage carried "data benefiting the enemy" to praise or publicize the system of the north.
					
					This suppression is the second one since the crackdown on the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students of Korea's Reunification in July last year, the report said.
					
					The south Korean Network for Progress denounced the police fascist violence as a serious human rights abuse.

articles.title: Halt to Moves to Conclude FTA Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to Moves to Conclude FTA Demanded

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Representatives of women farmers from across south Korea held a rally at the plaza of the Seoul City Office on August 25 demanding the authorities stop the moves to conclude the "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S.
					
					A resolution was read out at the rally.
					
					It termed the negotiations for concluding the south Korea-U.S. FTA humiliating and shackling ones.
					
					The "government" and the "Grand National Party" should immediately cancel the "motion calling for the National Assembly ratification of the FTA" as it will bring only damage to the farmers, it noted.
					
					We will stage a dynamic struggle for the life of the farmers, it stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Forces Hit for Extolling Pro-U.S. Dictator
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Forces Hit for Extolling Pro-U.S. Dictator

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Members of the Council of Bereaved Families of Those Civilians Killed after the Korean War, the Society of April Revolution, the Institute for National Studies and the Press Trade Union of south Korea staged a demonstration in Seoul on August 25 in protest against the farce of unveiling a statue of traitor Syngman Rhee who was ill-famed for hideous sycophancy and dictatorship staged by conservative forces.
					
					The erection of the statue is as shameless an act as defiling the spirit of the April 19 popular uprising and reviving dictatorship, the demonstrators charged.
					
					They stated Syngman Rhee was a dictator who was ousted from power after being judged by the people for his massacres of civilians and election fraud.
					
					They demanded that it be pulled down at once, noting that it is something which should not be allowed to erect the above-said statue in praise of him with the money collected from people as taxes.
					
					That day a demonstrator staged protest, standing in the way of the U.S. ambassador in Seoul when he was going back after taking part in the unveiling ceremony.

articles.title: Mun Jong Hyon Arrested by S. Korean Police
articles.content:
Mun Jong Hyon Arrested by S. Korean Police

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean police on August 25 arrested Rev. Mun Jong Hyon for lodging a protest against the suppression of the participants in the actions against the construction of the Jeju naval base.
					
					That day he fought against the Sogwipho Police Station trying to transfer the chairman of the Kangjong Village Association and two others to other police station in a bid to detain them.
					
					The police arrested him on the charge of disturbing its performance of its duty, a press report said.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Declare Actions against Fascist Crackdown
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Declare Actions against Fascist Crackdown

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A joint statement "We declare all-out emergency actions to cope with the situation created under the pretext of security" issued by the Kangjong Village Association of south Korea, the Special Island Committee for Peace of the Jeju Parish of the Roman Catholic Church, the All-Islanders Measure Committee for Checking the Jeju Military Base and south Korean Measure Council for Checking the Construction of Jeju Naval Base on August 25.
					
					The statement accused the security authorities of walking off participants in the action against the naval base construction including the chief of the Kangjong Village, Jeju Island on August 24 and contemplating detaining them under an absurd pretext.
					
					It blasted the authorities for setting in motion conservative press and organizations to brand those forces opposed to the base construction as "a leftist faction" and trying to hurl even police forces into cracking down upon the protesters.
					
					Reminding the authorities that brutal suppression is bound to entail fierce protest actions and reinforce the unity of various circles, the statement declared fascist crackdown would be countered with actions.
					
					Meanwhile, a spokesman for the south Korean Democratic Labor Party issued a commentary on August 26.
					
					It accused the security authorities of hurling even police of the inland into Jeju Island for putting down the struggle of people against the above-said military base construction, reviving the nightmare of the April 3 incident.

articles.title: South Korean Authorities Accused of Working Hard to Create Fresh Atmosphere of Suppression
articles.content:
South Korean Authorities Accused of Working Hard to Create Fresh Atmosphere of Suppression

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The opposition parties including the Democratic Party denounced the puppet authorities for scheming to create a fresh atmosphere of suppression, the south Korean CBS said.
					
					Recalling that at the Supreme Prosecutor's Office the police, the intelligence service, Defense Security Command, etc. held a meeting for security measures on August 26, opposition parties said it was skeptical such meeting was held in the run-up to the next year's election.
					
					They urged the authorities not to intimidate people by the same ruling method as employed in the period of the past military dictatorial regime.
					
					The regime is working hard to tide over the ruling crisis through suppression but it will only entail adverse consequences, they warned.

articles.title: S. Korean DLP Accuses Conservative Group of Building Statue of Former Dictator
articles.content:
S. Korean DLP Accuses Conservative Group of Building Statue of Former Dictator

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A vice-spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party (DLP) in south Korea released a commentary on August 25 censuring the puppet conservative group for its sinister moves to put forward Syngman Rhee, the pro-U.S. traitor and former dictator.
					
					It referred to the fact that the conservative organization held a ceremony of unveiling the statue of Syngman Rhee at a plaza in Seoul.
					
					The statue of the dictator which was pulled down by the participants in April 19 popular uprising was again set up after passage of 51 years, it deplored, blasting that to praise Rhee is tantamount to calling back the departed spirit of the dictator.
					
					What is more shocking is that the speaker of the "National Assembly" took part in the ceremony defying and insulting the spirit of April 19, the commentary charged, calling for getting the statue demolished at once.

articles.title: Appeal Calling for Foiling Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets Issued
articles.content:
Appeal Calling for Foiling Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets Issued

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The following is the full text of a joint appeal of the North, South and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration adopted at the joint academic seminar for checking Japan's moves to grab Tok Islets and urging Japan to settle its past crimes held on Monday:
					
					The Japanese imperialists' tentacles of aggression and colonial rule are persistently stretched to the Koreans even today though the old century is replaced by a new one.
					
					The Japanese prime minister said on August 10 last year that he "expressed apology in deep remorse and reflection" on the lapse of a centenary since the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty". But it was nothing but wordplay.
					
					The Japanese authorities justify Japan's colonial rule over Korea under the signboard of "modernization" in middle school textbooks on social subjects which went through the screening in 2011. They deleted from most of the textbooks published in the past such hideous crimes against humanity as the massacre of Koreans during the great Kanto Quake and the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army in a bid to conceal them.
					
					They are also bringing to light Japan's attempt to grab Tok Islets, part of the inviolable territory of Korea.
					
					They passed through screening middle school textbooks on social subjects raising a claim to Tok Islets in March. Japan released a diplomatic blue book in April and the "defense white paper" in August, shameful behaviors asserting that Tok Islets belong to Japan. Such moves touched off towering indignation among the Koreans.
					
					Japan is also becoming evermore undisguised in its unreasonable discrimination and political persecution of the Koreans in Japan, victims of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and their descendants.
					
					The Japanese authorities also excluded only Korean schools in Japan from the "tuition-waiver program for senior high schools." They are stepping up such anti-human rights and unethical discriminating policies as excluding them from assistance to the work for recovering from the damage done by the massive quake that hit East Japan and the ensuing tsunami.
					
					Japan is infringing upon the territorial sovereignty of the neighboring country and discriminating against the Koreans in Japan while distorting and hiding its war of aggression and colonial rule in the past, far from making apology and reparation for them. This is an indication that Japan's policy of aggression is going on.
					
					Japan, stop at once its moves to grab Tok Islets!
					
					Japan has persisted in its attempt to make the issue of the islets an international dispute with the far-fetched assertion that the islets belong to it and the U.S. is taking the attitude of conniving at and sympathizing with it.
					
					But many data including maps and old records dating back to several centuries ago prove that the islets are actually part of the territory of Korea from a historical and legal point of view.
					
					Japan's scheme to reduce the islets to a disputed region is absolutely intolerable as it revealed its wild ambition to reinvade Northeast Asia and Korea.
					
					Japan, make apology and reparation for its war of aggression and all other crimes it committed during its colonial rule!
					
					The hypocrisy of "reflection" uttered by the Japanese prime minister last year was brought to light by Japan's repeated claims to Tok Islets and distortion of its past history of aggression.
					
					Japan can never forge relations of peace and cooperation with any country without making apology and reparation for its war of aggression and colonial rule in the past.
					
					The Japanese government, make a formal apology and reparation to the victims of its war of aggression and colonial rule including the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army!
					
					Stop distorting history in textbooks but educate the young generation in peace and human rights by use of textbooks telling truth about Japan's war of aggression and colonial rule!
					
					The Japanese authorities, immediately stop all acts of hostility toward the Koreans in Japan and national discrimination against them and ensure their human rights, the right to existence and the right to national education!
					
					Let us courageously turn out in the struggle to force Japan to redress its past crimes and check its moves to seize Tok Islets!
					
					It is a common task for all the Koreans to force Japan to redeem its crime-woven past and foil its moves to grab Tok Islets. But the south side's "government" is preventing the people in the north and the south from meeting each other by putting the "May 24 measure" into force.
					
					It is very regretful that the north-south cooperation and solidarity to denounce Japan failed due to the present "government" as evidenced by the fact that the north side's delegation could not attend the international seminar on the issue of the comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army held in Seoul and the seminar could not be held in Kaesong.
					
					It is necessary to reenergize at an early date cooperation and solidarity among the organizations and figures of all social standings in the north and the south.
					
					The political parties, organizations and personages at home and abroad!
					
					Let us force Japan to redeem its past crimes and foil its moves to seize Tok Islets in order to protect the dignity and honor of the nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked abroad

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Kyrgyzstan, India, Pakistan, Mongolia, Bangladesh and by the secretariat of the Pan-African Movement from August 18 to 23 on the 51st anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					On display in the venues were photos on the exploits of the Songun revolutionary leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan, said that thanks to the Songun politics the peace and security were guaranteed in the Korean Peninsula and the region, and a firm foundation was laid to carry out the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. This has helped remarkably enhance the international position and influence of Korea, he added.
					
					Muhammad Berkat Ullah, chief of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised Kim Jong Il for not only firmly safeguarding the sovereignty and dignity of the country with the Songun politics but also bringing about world-startling changes and miracles in socialist construction.
					
					Osieno Stephen, executive advisor to the general secretary of the Pan-African Movement, noted that the military power of the DPRK has entered the highest phase and amazing miracles and changes have been made in all fabrics of social life including economy, culture, education and public health under Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership for over 50 years.
					
					The  speakers at the joint seminar in India spoke highly of Kim Jong Il for brilliantly leading the struggle of the Korean people for the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation and national reunification through his outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					Messages to Kim Jong Il and joint statement were adopted at the seminars in India.

articles.title: Songun Politics Lauded by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Songun Politics Lauded by Foreign Organizations

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations marked the 51st anniversary of start of Songun revolutionary leadership by Kim Jong Il.
					
					The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a joint statement on Aug. 21 that under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the army and the people of the DPRK have firmly safeguarded the sovereignty of the country. His Songun politics is the most perfect political mode, he added.
					
					The Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions noted in a statement on Aug. 23 that Kim Jong Il put forward the Korean People's Army as the main force of the revolution and turned it into an invincible army that no army of any other country can match, thus bringing the national might to the highest phase.
					
					It is thanks to the strong Korean army that a new war has not broken out in the Korean Peninsula and regional peace and stability been preserved till now since the Korean war.
					
					Saber Ballul, head of Department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus, in a statement on Aug. 24 said that it is recognized by the world that Kim Jong Il has led the Korean people along the road of Songun, bringing about a radical advance in the accomplishment of the cause of national reunification.
					
					He stressed that thanks to the Songun politics the revolutionary gains have been firmly safeguarded and the politico-ideological and military positions of the Korean revolution have been further consolidated.

articles.title: West Displeased with Development of DPRK-Russia Relations: Newspaper
articles.content:
West Displeased with Development of DPRK-Russia Relations: Newspaper

					Moscow, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Pravda August 25 carried an article titled "Russia's Achievements Concerning DPRK Issue Is Bone Stuck in Throat for West."
					
					The Russia visit of Kim Jong Il, leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, drew interest of the west's officials and media, the article said, adding:
					
					The west's media are taking trouble to find out what Kim Jong Il agreed with the Russian leadership. What is more, the west believes that the agreements are impermanent.
					
					At the talks in Ulan-Ude, the DPRK expressed a willingness to resume the six-party talks. Both sides agreed to lay a gas pipe across the DPRK territory.
					
					The U.S. newspaper Wall Street Journal surmised that, because several rounds of talks bore no fruits, the talks on a gas pipe would end in failure. But, the surmise went wrong.
					
					New York Times gave misgivings about the longtime effect of the results of the talks. In actuality, however, the misgivings also proved wrong and the DPRK nuclear program did not make the talks difficult.

articles.title: We Will Closely Cooperate with Korea in Protecting Disabled: Chinese Official
articles.content:
We Will Closely Cooperate with Korea in Protecting Disabled: Chinese Official

					Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The visiting vice-director of the International Affairs Department of the China Disabled Persons' Federation, Wei Mengxin, was interviewed by KCNA Monday prior to his returning home.
					
					Question: Will you give me your impressions of Pyongyang?
					
					Answer: When I was serving in the Chinese People's Liberation Army, I could learn many things about the Democratic People's Republic of Korea through its pictorials and movies.
					
					I had wanted to visit Korea when an opportunity comes.
					
					I am pleased to visit Pyongyang.
					
					During my visit, I have had many things to remember. Especially, I could see from the plane the beautiful scenery and standardized farmland of the DPRK.
					
					While talking with Korean people, I could feel their friendly feelings towards the Chinese people.
					
					Question; What did you visit during your stay in Korea?
					
					Answer: Members of my delegation visited President Kim Il Sung's old home in Mangyongdae, Through the visit we were deeply moved by the Korean people's deep reverence for the President.
					
					Kim Il Sung was an old friend and comrade-in-arms of the Chinese people. 
					
					During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he fought together with the Chinese comrades against the common enemy.
					
					Monumental edifices in Pyongyang, including the Tower of the Juche Idea, mirror the wisdom and creativity of the Korean people.
					
					I could also sense the mental power and strength displayed by the Korean people in the effort to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the country's reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Question: Leader Kim Jong Il visited northeast China again a few days ago. What do you think about it?
					
					Answer: China-DPRK friendship has a long history. His visit demonstrated the invariable will of the Workers' Party and Government of Korea to develop the bilateral relations through generations.
					
					I think it is a very important work to further consolidate the China-DPRK friendship, following the tradition of elder generations.
					
					Our delegation is visiting Korea for this purpose.
					
					We will closely cooperate with Korea in protecting the disabled in step with the development of China-DPRK friendship.

articles.title: Chinese Defense Ministry Rejects U.S. Accusations
articles.content:
Chinese Defense Ministry Rejects U.S. Accusations

					Beijing, August 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Chinese Defense Ministry in a statement on August 26 scathingly rejected the U.S. accusations against his country.
					
					In the annual report, titled "Military and Security Developments Involving the People's Republic of China" for 2011 the U.S. Department of Defense spoke ill of China's normal defense and army construction and played up the so-called Chinese mainland's "military threat" to Taiwan, and made groundless claims on China's policies on space and network security.
					
					China is resolutely opposed to the report as it severely distorted the facts, the spokesman said.
					
					"China demands that the U.S. side views China's military development in an objective and fair manner," Yang said.

articles.title: Daqing-Red Banner of China's Industrial Front
articles.content:
Daqing--Red Banner of China's Industrial Front

					Beijing, August 28 (KCNA) -- Daqing emerged a major centre of China's industrial front under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.
					
					Oil which the Chinese people had longed for so much gushed out in Daqing in a strong windy day on the threshold of the 10th anniversary of the People's Republic of China in 1959, adding to the festive atmosphere of the holiday.
					
					More than 30 000 soldiers of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and thousands of scientists, technicians and youth developed at least 860 square kilometers of oil fields in the first three years in this northern land and started to increase its production.
					
					Daqing has turned into a large oil producer and a comprehensive oil industrial city equipped with various industrial sectors including oil processing, chemical and textile industries.
					
					The urban construction started in real earnest from 1979.
					
					Modern streets appeared. There are in every residential district shops, restaurants, schools, kindergartens, nurseries, hospitals, cinema houses and other cultural and educational facilities. 
					
					Drawing the attention of visitors in the center of the city are the schoolchildren's palace, stadium, swimming pool, theatre and other modern buildings.
					
					The Daqing oil fields have produced a total of more than 2 billion tons of oil for the past 50-odd years. This accounts for about 40 percent of the total oil output of the country.
					
					At least 8 250 scientific research achievements were made in the oil fields and more than 1 700 of them were awarded state prizes.
					
					The oil produced here is greatly contributing to speeding up the economic development.
					
					Many cadres and workers of the oil fields were dispatched to other newly developed oil fields across the country and are now working as core forces to push ahead with the nation's oil industry.
					
					Therefore, the Chinese people say today's economic development would have been unthinkable without the Daqing Oil Fields.
					
					The experience accumulated by workers in Daqing and their responsible work style are giving spurs to achieving the strategic goals for socialist economic construction of the Chinese people.
					
					The red banner of Daqing will remain vigorously fluttering in the dynamic advance of socialist China.

articles.title: Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of CPV under Reconstruction
articles.content:
Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of CPV under Reconstruction

					Hoechang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A project for reconstructing the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV) in Hoechang County, South Phyongan Province, is making rapid progress.
					
					Buried in the cemetery are remains of commanding officers of the CPV including martyr Mao Anying, who laid down their lives in the fight against the common enemies in the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					Construction forces were formed and measures were taken for designing and rebuilding the cemetery and ensuring the supply of materials for the project.
					
					Builders are successfully restoring original wooden buildings to suit the aesthetic tastes of the Chinese people, strictly abiding by the principle of historicism.
					
					In particular, they truthfully re-presented the gatehouse with a signboard written by Guo Moruo on a permanent basis, adding to its truthfulness.
					
					In the meantime, the reconstruction projects including pavilion and fountain pond are being pushed forward in quality.
					
					A bronze statue depicting a fighter of the CPV and carved images on its both sides in the cemetery are represented on a high level.
					
					The pavement of the road leading to the cemetery was completed in a short time from the start of the project and a new parking lot covering thousands of square meters is now under construction.
					
					The pavement of the road between Kangdong and Hoechang is also making successful progress.

articles.title: China Rejects Annual Report of U.S. Department of Defense
articles.content:
China Rejects Annual Report of U.S. Department of Defense

					Beijing, August 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Chinese Foreign Ministry rejected the "Military and Security Developments Involving the People's Republic of China" for 2011 made public by the U.S. Department of Defense at a press conference on August 26.

					"China unswervingly adheres to the path of peaceful development, and its national defense policy is defensive in nature," he said.
					
					China's defense building "is solely to safeguard its own sovereignty and territorial integrity, and ensure smooth economic and social development, and does not target any country," he added.

articles.title: Iran Labels U.S. Principal Sponsor of Terrorism
articles.content:
Iran Labels U.S. Principal Sponsor of Terrorism

The spokesman dismissed such assertion as groundless, adding that the U.S. is slandering other countries though it is aiding and organizing terrorist acts.

articles.title: Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union Pledges to Serve Nation

articles.title: Informacion detallada de la visita de Kim Jong Il al nordeste chino
articles.content:
Informacion detallada de la visita de Kim Jong Il al nordeste chino

					Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizo entre los dias 25 y 27 su visita historica a la region nordeste de la Republica Popular China pasando por ella en el trayecto de repatriacion tras finalizar su visita a las regiones de Siberia y Lejano Oriente de Rusia.
					
					Le acompanaron Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Pak Pong Ju, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, O Su Yong, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Ji Jae Ryong, embajador coreano en China, y Ri Ki Bom, consul general coreano en Shenyang.
					
					Los lideres del partido y el Estado y habitantes de China dieron calida bienvenida a Kim Jong Il, quien volvio a visitar a China con el mensaje de gran amistad hacia el pueblo chino, y le trataron con maxima sinceridad y hospitalidad.
					
					Por el encargo especial del Secretario General    Hu Jintao y del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, le acogio con amabilidad el dia 26 en la provincia de Heilongjiang el consejero de Estado de la Republica Popular China, Dai Bingguo.
					
					En el recibimiento estuvieron presentes el jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Wang Jiarui, el ministro de Ferrocarriles, Sheng Guangzu, y otros cuadros directivos del centro y los del partido y el gobierno de la mencionada provincia china.
					
					Kim Jong Il y Dai Bingguo saludaron atentamente uno al otro y sostuvieron conversaciones. 
					
					Dai Bingguo saludo calurosamente a Kim Jong Il en nombre del Secretario General Hu Jintao, la direccion del PCCh y todo el pueblo chino, apuntando que la region nordeste de China, que volvio a tenerle a los 3 meses, esta envuelta en el clima de alborozo para darle bienvenida
					
					Las valoraciones, que ha dado el camarada       Kim Jong Il durante su visita a Mongolia Interior y la provincia de Heilongjiang sobre la construccion por la modernizacion del socialismo en China, devienen un estimulo y apoyo ilimitados al pueblo chino que avanza bajo la direccion del PCCh, dijo Dai Bingguo expresando la voluntad del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China de luchar activamente junto con los camaradas coreanos por fortalecer y desarrollar la tradicional amistad China-Corea.
					
					Dai Bingguo ofrecio una recepcion en honor de  Kim Jong Il, la cual transcurrio en una atmosfera cordial y amistosa. 
					
					Ese dia, Kim Jong Il recorrio varias empresas y obras de construccion urbana de las ciudades de Qiqihar y Daqing guiado por Dai Bingguo, Wang Jiarui, Sheng Guangzu y otros cuadros directivos del centro.
					
					Dai Bingguo volvio a saludar a Kim Jong Il, quien pasa por la region nordeste de China luego de terminar su visita a Rusia, en nombre de la direccion central de China, inclusive el Secretario General Hu Jintao, y le despidio cordialmente.
					
					Durante 3 dias de paso por el nordeste chino,    Kim Jong Il recibio una acogida sincera y hospitalaria de los cuadros directivos del centro y la region y habitantes locales en todos los lugares visitados y conocio mejor las costumbres y la vida de esos ultimos sosteniendo conversaciones amistosas con ellos.
					
					En todo el curso de su estancia alli, le acompanaron Wang Jiarui y Sheng Guangzu por el encargo especial de la direccion central de China, incluyendo al Secretario General Hu Jintao.
					
					Le acompanaron tambien los cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de las respectivas provincias y ciudades.
					
					Kim Jong Il paso el dia 25 la region autonoma de Mongolia Interior.
					
					Llego por la tarde de ese dia a Manzhouli, estacion ferroviaria fronteriza.
					
					Cuando entro en la estacion el tren con el Dirigente a bordo, le acogieron cordialmente el jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Wang Jiarui, el ministro de Ferrocarriles, Sheng Guangzu, el secretario del Comite del PCCh en la Region Autonoma de Mongolia Interior, Hu Chunhua, el secretario general del mismo comite, el secretario del Comite Municipal del PCCh en Hulun Buir, el alcalde de Hulun Buir, el secretario del Comite Municipal del PCCh en Manzhouli, y otros cuadros directivos del centro y la region.
					
					Tras intercambiar saludos atentos con los cuadros que le recibieron, Kim Jong Il converso con ellos.
					
					Wang Jiarui dijo que ha sido enviado especialmente para guiar al respetado camarada Kim Jong Il en todo el trayecto de su paso por el nordeste chino, por el encargo de Hu Jintao y la direccion central de China, y expreso el testimonio de su mas alta consideracion al Dirigente quien hace gran aporte a la amistad entre los paises y al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de la humanidad mediante sus energicas actividades exteriores. 
					
					Kim Jong Il expreso agradecimiento por el calido recibimiento de los cuadros directivos del centro y la region como Wang Jiarui.
					
					Guiado por los cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de la region autonoma, recorrio el municipio de Hailar de la ciudad de Hulun Buir y contemplo el panorama nocturno cerciorandose de la historia, la cultura y los exitos de construccion de los habitantes locales.
					
					El comite del partido en la region autonoma ofrecio un banquete opiparo en honor de Kim Jong Il.
					
					Cuando el aparecio en el salon de recepcion, las mujeres chinas le ofrecieron un pano azul de seda y el licor segun la costumbre nacional para dar calida bienvenida.
					
					Hu Chunhua dijo que se cumplio por fin el deseo del comite del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de la region autonoma al recibir hoy al respetado camarada Kim Jong Il en la extensa estepa de la region donde el Presidente Kim Il Sung habia sido acogido hospitalariamente en sus reiteradas visitas.
					
					Indico que la tradicional amistad China-Corea sera siempre fresca y eterna junto con la historia como la estepa y aseguro que el amistoso pueblo coreano lograra nuevos exitos en el mejoramiento de los niveles de su vida y en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Se ofrecio una funcion artistica preparada especialmente para el Dirigente.
					
					A traves del espectaculo, los ejecutantes demostraron bien el respeto y la veneracion infinitos del gobierno y el pueblo de la region autonoma  hacia el Dirigente quien visito de nuevo a China para el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de la amistad China-Corea.
					
					Kim Jong Il mando un cesto de flores a ellos felicitandoles por la exitosa funcion y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					Hu Chunhua le obsequio regalo en nombre del comite del partido en la region autonoma.
					
					Kim Jong Il agradecio la calida bienvenida y agasajo del comite del partido, el gobierno y los habitantes de la region autonoma y expreso su esperanza de que bajo la direccion del PCCh, esos ultimos lograran nuevas victorias en la lucha por la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Kim Jong Il paso el dia 26 por la provincia de Heilongjiang en la region nordeste de China. 
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente         Kim Jong Il la visitaron varias veces durantes sus historicas visitas al extranjero.
					
					En particular, en mayo ultimo, el Dirigente estuvo en la ciudad de Mudanjiang en su visita a las regiones nordeste y Huadong de China.
					
					El llego ese dia por la manana a la ciudad de Qiqihar, la segunda de la provincia de Heilongjiang despues de Harbin y la mas vieja base industrial del nordeste chino.
					
					Cuando llego a la estacion ferroviaria de Qiqihar el tren con Kim Jong Il a bordo, le acogieron cordialmente el secretario del Comite Provincial del Partido Comunista de China en Heilongjiang, Ji Bingxuan, el gobernador de la misma provincia, Wang Xiankui, el secretario del Comite Municipal del PCCh en Qiqihar, el alcalde de Qiqihar y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de la provincia y la ciudad.
					
					Ninos chinos saludaron calurosamente a           Kim Jong Il tras entregarle ramos de flores.
					
					Kim Jong Il intercambio saludos y departio con los cuadros que le recibieron. 
					
					Ji Bingxuan dio calida bienvenida a Kim Jong Il en nombre del comite provincial del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Heilongjiang, destacando que es un gran honor y orgullo tener otra vez en su region al Dirigente quien continua su largo viaje al extranjero por la amistad entre los paises.
					
					Kim Jong Il visito el Grupo de Maquinas Herramientas no.2 de Qiqihar, una de las renombradas bases de produccion de grandes maquinas herramientas CNC necesarias a la construccion economica de China.
					
					Tras escuchar el historial que le ha contado un funcionario directivo del grupo, se informo en detalles del estado de produccion, desarrollo tecnico y administracion recorriendo varios procesos de produccion.
					
					Seguidamente, visito la fabrica filial de la Compania de Industria Lactea de Mengniu. 
					
					Esta empresa productora de leche esa la mas grande de China que produce anualmente 6 millones 500 mil toneladas de productos lacteos.
					
					Despues de pasar revista a la sala de control combinado, tanques de leche, taller de empaque y las muestras, formulo votos por el mayor avance en los trabajos de la compania por el mejoramiento de la vida alimentaria del pueblo y el fomento de su bienestar.
					
					El mismo dia, visito la ciudad de Daqing.
					
					Escucho explicaciones sobre el estado de construccion urbana y el plan perspectivo en la sala de exhibicion de urbanismo de la ciudad de Daqing y recorrio el area de viviendas, un gran puente y el puente del lago Liming en el curso de construccion en el contorno de una zona pantanosa y otros puntos de la provincia.
					
					El Comite Provincial del PCCh ofrecio  ese dia por la noche un banquete en honor de Kim Jong Il.
					
					Fue invitado a la recepcion el Dirigente.
					
					Ji Bingxuan senalo que esta visita historica a la provincia de Heilongjiang, que repite el estimado camarada Kim Jong Il a los 3 meses, es una muestra contundente de la amistad China-Corea en constante desarrollo. 
					
					Subrayo que el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de la provincia desempenaran mayor papel junto con el pueblo coreano en continuar y desarrollar de generacion en generacion la amistad China-Corea.
					
					Se ofrecio una funcion artistica preparada especialmente para el Dirigente. 
					
					En la ocasion actuaron famosas entidades de arte nacional y artistas de la region incluyendo la banda musical nacional y el conjunto de danza del Teatro de Canciones y Danzas de la provincia de Heilongjiang.
					
					En el repertorio estuvieron las piezas de diferentes generos como el solo masculino "Cancion de remeros de Wusuli Jiang", el baile "Bendicion", el duo de instrumentos musicales "Festejo" y las canciones coreanas "!Encantado!", "Campanula", etc.
					
					Esta funcion demostro bien la emocion y el jubilo que tiene el pueblo chino por volver a tener al Dirigente en la significativa region nordeste.
					
					Kim Jong Il mando un cesto de flores a los ejecutantes felicitandoles por la exitosa funcion.
					
					El comite del partido y el gobierno popular de la provincia le dedicaron ese dia un presente. 
					
					El agradecio la calida bienvenida y agasajo del comite del partido, el gobierno y los habitantes de Heilongjiang y expreso su esperanza de que bajo la direccion del PCCh, esos ultimos lograran nuevas victorias en la lucha por la prosperidad y el desarrollo del pais.
					
					Kim Jong Il paso el dia 27 por la provincia de Jilin.
					
					Por la manana de ese dia, el llego a la ciudad de Tonghua.
					
					Cuando llego a la estacion ferroviaria de Tonghua el tren en que viajaba Kim Jong Il, le acogieron cordialmente el secretario del Comite Provincial del Partido Comunista de China en Jilin, Sun Zhengcai, el gobernador de la misma provincia, Wang Yulin, el secretario del Comite Municipal del PCCh en Tonghua, Liu Baowei, el alcalde de Tonghua, Tian Yulin, y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de la provincia y la ciudad.
					
					Tras intercambiar saludos con los cuadros que le recibieron, Kim Jong Il visito guiado por ellos la Corporacion Ltd. de Vino de Tonghua.
					
					Sobre todo, recordo con emocion las nobles huellas de la visita a esa compania realizada hace casi medio siglo por el Presidente Kim Il Sung quien no dejaba de meditar y reflexionar para hacer prospera la patria y feliz al pueblo.
					
					Recorrio varios puntos de la compania, inclusive el deposito de vino y la exposicion de productos, averiguando en detalles el historial y el sistema de produccion de ella, el modo de conservacion y sabor de los productos, y deseo mayor avance en el trabajo de esta empresa para el incremento del bienestar del pueblo.
					
					El comite del partido y el gobierno de la provincia de Jilin ofrecieron este dia un banquete opiparo en honor de Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Fue invitado a la recepcion el Dirigente.
					
					Sun Zhengcai dijo en su discurso que es un privilegio y honor de Jilin tener en esta provincia al camarada Kim Jong Il tres veces en un ano y pico y expreso la maxima consideracion y calurosa bienvenida a este en nombre del comite del partido, el gobierno y la poblacion de la provincia de Jilin. 
					
					Todo el pueblo chino, incluso los habitantes de la provincia de Jilin, esta complacido de los exitos que alcanza ultimamente el pueblo coreano en su lucha por conmemorar significativamente el centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, considerandolos como los propios, apunto y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que bajo la orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por el camarada Kim Jong Il, el pueblo coreano lograra sin falta su victoria fulminante en la lucha por construir un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					El comite del partido, el gobierno y la poblacion de la provincia de Jilin desempenaran un papel mas importante para continuar y desarrollar generacion tras generacion la amistad China-Corea junto con el pueblo coreano, destaco.
					
					Acto seguido, se ofrecio una funcion artistica preparada para Kim Jong Il.
					
					La funcion causo el desborde de aplausos del publico. 
					
					Este dia, el comite del partido y el gobierno popular de la citada provincia dedicaron presente a      Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Dirigente expreso agradecimiento por la calida bienvenida y recibimiento hospitalario del comite del partido, el gobierno y la poblacion de la provincia de Jilin y les deseo nuevos exitos en la lucha por alcanzar la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo bajo la guia del PCCh.
					
					Ese dia, el termino su larga gira de mas de 20 mil ri (10 ri equivalen a 4 kilometros), que lo llevo a Siberia y Lejano Oriente de Rusia y al nordeste de China, y partio hacia la patria. 
					
					Antes de partida, intercambio cordiales saludos de despedida con Wang Jiarui, Sheng Guangzu y otros cuadros directivos del centro, que le guiaron con sinceridad en todo el trayecto de visita, y con los cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de la provincia y la ciudad como Sun Zhengcai y Wang Yulin. 
					
					Cuando el tren del Dirigente partio de la estacion ferroviaria fronteriza, los cuadros chinos le despidieron cordialmente agitando largamente sus manos. 
					
					Haciendo escala en varias ciudades y zonas de China, el profundizo sus conocimientos sobre la construccion, la idiosincrasia, la politica, la economia, la historia y la cultura y otras cosas del pueblo chino y contribuyo enormemente al desarrollo de la amistad Corea-China mediante sus incansables actividades exteriores.
					
					El paso y la visita de Kim Jong Il a la region nordeste de China se realizaron exitosamente bajo la atencion especial del Secretario General Hu Jintao, el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China. 
					
					El expreso su satisfaccion por ello y manifesto su sincero agradecimiento por el trato atento y hospitalario del CC del PCCh, el Consejo de Estado y los cuadros directivos de la region autonoma de Mongolia Interior, las provincias de Heilongjiang y Jilin y los habitantes de estas localidades.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Idea of South Africa said at a seminar on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" that leader Kim Jong Il successfully succeeded to the revolutionary cause, Songun cause of President Kim Il Sung with the noble sense of moral obligation and has wisely led the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation, the desire of the President, with Songun politics.
					
					 The general secretary of the C.C. of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) expressed full sympathy and support for the greatness and validity of the Songun politics.
					
					Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in Nepal and Pakistan.

articles.content:
Publicado llamamiento conjunto en seminario academico

					Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ACNC) -- En el seminario academico conjunto para frenar la agresion de Japon al islote Tok y urgirle la liquidacion del pasado criminal, que tuvo lugar este lunes, quedo aprobado el llamamiento conjunto de los Comites del Norte, el Sur y Ultramar para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					El texto sigue abajo:
					
					Aun en el nuevo siglo, no se dejan de extender las garras de agresion y coloniaje del imperialismo japones.
					
					El 10 de agosto del ano pasado, con motivo del centenario de la fabricacion del "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon", el premier japones dijo que "pide disculpas partiendo del remordimiento profundo". Pero, esto no fue mas que una buena combinacion de palabras.
					
					De hecho, en los manuales de asignaturas sociales para las escuelas secundarias, aprobados en 2011, las autoridades japonesas justifican su dominacion colonial sobre Corea bajo el rotulo de "modernizacion".
					
					Ademas, encubren sus crimenes de lesa humanidad como el genocidio de coreanos durante el gran terremoto de Kanto y el caso de ex consoladoras sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones, los cuales habian sido incluidos en la mayoria de los manuales anteriores.
					
					Para colmo, exponen abiertamente el intento de arrebatar el islote Tok, una parte del sagrado territorio coreano.
					
					En marzo ultimo, dieron luz verde a los manuales de asignaturas sociales de la secundaria que insisten en la "soberania japonesa sobre el islote Tok".
					
					Volvieron a insistir lo mismo en la carta azul diplomatica publicada en abril y la "carta blanca de defensa" circulada en agosto, lo cual causa vehemente indignacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					Se tornan cada vez mas brutales la discriminacion y el acoso politico a las victimas coreanas del coloniaje japones y sus descendientes que residen ahora en Japon.
					
					Entre otras medidas anti-DDHH y anti-eticas, las autoridades japonesas excluyeron unicamente a las escuelas coreanas de la lista de escuelas superiores subsidiadas y de objetos de reconstruccion del gran terremoto y subsiguiente tsunami que azotaron la zona Tohoku de Japon.
					
					El atentado contra la soberania del pais vecino y la discriminacion de los coreanos, acompanados de la tergiversacion y disimulacion de las guerras de agresion y el colonialismo del siglo pasado, demuestran que sigue en pie la politica de agresiones de Japon.
					
					!Que Japon pare ahora mismo sus acciones para despojar el islote Tok!
					
					Hasta la fecha, Japon vino pretendiendo hacer del islote Tok una zona litigiosa internacional difundiendo su absurda opinion de que este le pertenece. Y EE.UU. toma la actitud de tolerar y simpatizar tal insistencia de Japon.
					
					Pero, bastan los datos como mapas hechos varios siglos atras y registros de historia que comprueban en lo historico, legal y practico que el islote Tok forma parte del territorio coreano.
					
					No se puede tolerar jamas las citadas pretensiones de Japon que exponen la ambicion de agredir de nuevo al nordeste asiatico y a Corea.
					
					!Que Japon pida disculpas por todos sus crimenes relacionados con las guerras de agresion y dominacion colonial y los indemnice!
					
					Lo falso del "remordimiento" referido el ano pasado por el premier japones se ha revelado a todo el mundo en los persistentes intentos de Japon de usurpar el Tok y en la tergiversacion de la historia de sus agresiones del pasado.
					
					Japon no puede establecer con nadie las relaciones pacificas y de cooperacion sin que pida disculpas e indemnice los danos causados por sus guerras de agresion y coloniaje.
					
					!Que el gobierno japones pida disculpas oficialmente e indemnice a las victimas de sus guerras de agresion y dominacion colonial incluso a las ex consoladoras sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones!
					
					!Suspenda la tergiversacion de manuales e imparta la educacion de paz y DDHH a las nuevas generaciones con los manuales que narren tal como fueron las guerras de agresion y la dominacion colonial! 
					
					!Que las autoridades japonesas pongan de inmediato fin a los actos hostiles de toda indole y a la discriminacion nacional contra los coreanos residentes en Japon!
					
					!Levantemonos para saldar la cuenta de los crimenes del pasado de Japon y frustrar sus maniobras agresivas sobre el islote Tok!
					
					Aunque eso es la tarea comun de toda la nacion, el "gobierno" surcoreano impide el encuentro de distintos sectores del Norte y el Sur aplicando las "medidas del 24 de mayo". 
					
					Realmente, la delegacion nortena no pudo asistir al seminario internacional sobre el problema de ex consoladoras, celebrado en Seul, y el presente seminario no pudo abrirse en Kaesong como se habia previsto.
					
					Es muy lamentable que no se lograran la cooperacion y la alianza entre ambas partes coreanas para denunciar los actos de Japon por culpa del actual "gobierno" surcoreano. 
					
					Hay que activar lo mas pronto posible la cooperacion y la alianza entre las entidades y personalidades de distintos estratos del Norte y el Sur. 
					
					Los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades en el interior y exterior del pais, 
					
					!Liquidemos los crimenes del pasado de Japon y frustremos sus maniobras agresivas sobre el islote Tok por la dignidad y honor de nuestra nacion!

articles.title: Mercancias coreanas centran atencion en la feria de Rason
articles.content:
Mercancias coreanas centran atencion en la feria de Rason

					Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron gran aceptacion las mercancias coreanas en la recien clausurada 1a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason.
					
					En la ocasion fueron exhibidas mas de 30 mil mercancias de mas de 180 generos de las fabricas, empresas y companias nacionales, incluso las de la ciudad de Rason.
					
					La renombrada Compania de Maquinaria Ryonha presento los aparatos de recorte y medicion, la Compania Comercial Hyesong de Rason, los vestidos y la Compania Industrial Tongbang de Rason, el lodo sulfurico, el liquido nutritivo de piel, etc.
					
					En particular, las baterias de varios tipos exhibidas por la Fabrica de Baterias Taedonggang, el abono combinado organico de la Compania Mixta Paeksok de Rason y los materiales espumosos inorganicos de la Compania Comercial Taehung de Rason fueron elogiados por los visitantes por sus usos practicos.
					
					Los productos que despertaron el interes de los extranjeros fueron la lechuga amarga de la Fabrica de Medicinas Coryo de Phyongchon, que surte efectos especiales en la terapia de danos causados por radiaciones, diabetes y hepatitis, las pildoras nutritivas de asteria de la Compania Comercial Jinung, la almohada de sustancias naturales activas y la piedra de moxibustion de la Compania de Comercio Tecnico Ogasan de Rason, el arroz de Hongsam (ginseng rojo) Coryo de Kaesong.
					
					Ademas, nunca se vaciaron de visitantes los puestos de la Compania Comercial General 28 de Agosto de Corea y la Fabrica de Bebidas de Rajin que participaron en la feria con los abrigos, gorras y bufandas hechos con la piel de conejo y alimentos y bebidas de decenas de variedades.
					
					Durante la feria, las unidades participantes de Corea discutieron con las companias comerciales de varios paises las posibilidades de transacciones comerciales y firmaron los contratos de exportacion e importacion de beneficio mutuo.
